ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 115
ygData.msgSnippet: I am sure the ghoul lord is not lvl 53. He cons yellow almost evertime at lvl 45. Just watch out for His Harm touch OUCH. And 2 Ykeshas with a haste sash is
ygData.messageBody:
I am sure the ghoul lord is not lvl 53. He cons
yellow almost evertime at lvl 45. Just watch out for
His Harm touch OUCH. And 2 Ykeshas with a haste sash
is prolly the best combo after lvl 40, but I imagine a
mithril 2H is good choice as well if you have some
obscene strength.

Xraxex D'Tosorv
Indigo brotherhood
Karana






> Message: 1
> Date: Tue, 19 Oct 1999 18:45:52 -0500
> From: "James Ramsay" <wayfarer@...>
> Subject: Re: items site?
>
> The best advice has been to keep all your skills up.
> I regularly use multiple weapons dependant on the
> situation. On multiple Mobs I use Painbringer and a
> Shield of the Slain Unicorn. This combo causes AE
> dmg to all mobs to make sure that all focus on me,
> and the shield (due to my decent agility) adds 14 AC
> to reduce the amount of DMG I take. The Monk and
> casters in our group deal out plenty of damage
> without the Mobs beating them to death. If fighting
> multiple opponents who use damage shields, I use
> Fleshripper. Again the AE of the weapon keeps the
> Mobs on me while I take significantly less dmg due
> to swinging fewer times while still dishing out
> excellent dmg. Finally, if we are fighting a single
> Mob, I use the Executioner's Axe due to it's massive
> Dmg and the haste effect. I have even been known to
> wield BullSmasher due to it's traditional Dwarven
> appeal (not to mention the tremendous dmg delay
> ratio).
>
> Hendall
> 42nd Dwarven Warrior
> Eci
>
> P.S. I believe the Ykesha effect is DD rather than
> AE. Once I get one, I plan to use the Ykesha and
> Painbringer for the significant non-melee dmg.
>
>
> Date: Mon, 18 Oct 1999 16:37:18 -0400
> From: "shaner" <shaner@...>
> Subject: Re: items site?
>
> Well Dual Wielding is good from 13-20. After that 2h
> Weapons inflict MUCH more damage. Dual Wield really
> doesnt go off alot until lvl 38+, and by that time
> you should have an Executionars Axe (DAM 25 DELAY 50
> procs for Haste). With the exe axe my average slash
> is around 65 and i have had up to 81 normal and 142
> crits. However seems almost all the lvl 45+ warriors
> on my server without fearplane blades are switching
> over to DW Short Swords of Ykesha (DAM 8 DELAY 24
> procs for 79-point Ykesha AE spell). Ykesha swords
> are hard to come by though, as they are found on the
> Ghould Lord (lvl 53) in Lower Guk.
>
> Nochtero D'Ebonfury
> 35th Dark Elf Warrior
> Cazic-Thule
